name: sparkly_clean
description: spark joy in your folder organization processes - deletes folders that are longer than two weeks old, moves all folders with a specific name, prints out directory structure and encourages you to think about only things that make you a happy coder, deletes folders that are git repositories, moves readme into your portfolio

scripts.deploy: npm run play && git add . && git commit -m 'updated' && git push && npm version patch && npm publish

author: Lesley Cheung (www.github.com/zen-out)
